channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Ok well i am trying to completely code my server i got to have a new home, shop area, jad arena, and all that crud... i need help on 2 things...
I am trying to add a shop.. i have added one code to the shops.java and i need to add another code to autospawn.java.... i dont have an autospawn so i was wondering how to make one ;D
second question..... how do i change the co-ords of the "home" button on the emote tab??
many thanks if you can help me

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

thanks, i will try that out…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Doom32dd, post:1, topic:251355”]Ok well i am trying to completely code my server i got to have a new home, shop area, jad arena, and all that crud… i need help on 2 things…

I am trying to add a shop… i have added one code to the shops.java and i need to add another code to autospawn.java… i dont have an autospawn so i was wondering how to make one ;D

second question… how do i change the co-ords of the “home” button on the emote tab??

many thanks if you can help me[/quote]

You do have an autospawn.cfg. Look for it near the top of the folder or in other folders. If you have a config folder, it may also be in there.

For changing the emote tab, go into your client class and search for

home

and change:
A. where it shows the coordinates.

B. or it may show something like this:

customCommand("home");

Just replace that with

teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####;

You can also just right click on the actual tab on the server, and it should give you an ID. Search for case: ####, with #### being the ID shown by right-clicking, and it should give you the name and where its teleporting you.

I hope that didn’t sound too confusing, but tell me if you need more help.

Read full topic

item.description:
@dillsta2 wrote:

Uhm I have no idea on the first question lol , but I am pretty sure that evey emote tab button has a number like 1 , 2 or 3.

if you could maybe figure that out you would have a good chance of being able to change its positon.
